title: Ana y José Collection
description: Ahora puedes formar parte de nuestra familia Ana y José Collection
h1: NOW YOU CAN BE PART OF OUR FAMILY ANA AND JOSÉ COLLECTION

presentation.part1: Love and hard work have been the pillars of Ana and Jose Collection for over 38 years, which has positioned us as pioneers of hospitality in Tulum. We have grown hand in hand with this wonderful city and its people, managing to form a great family with guests who visit us from all over the world.
presentation.part2: Increasingly concerned with creating authentic and unforgettable experiences for each member of our family, we have created the [Ana y José Family Member] program with which you will obtain exclusive benefits that will make your vacation a magical moment that you can share with your loved ones.
presentation.part3: Below we share with you the incredible experiences you will have access to being part of our family:

successMessage.sub: We'll get in touch as soon as posible.

formBenefits.title: TO ACQUIRE THESE INCREDIBLE BENEFITS YOU JUST HAVE TO APPLY
formBenefits.name: Name
formBenefits.terms: Limited promotion subject to availability. Not applicable with other promotions. Valid for one year. Booking window: June 1 to December 28, 2021. Travel window: June 1 to December 20, January 15 to March 25, April 12 to October 31, 2021, December 1 to December 15, 2021. 2 nights min. 4 pax max (2 bedrooms). Capacity limited to room type.
